https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/RR0bnpaQ3LnNVHDvB1GWsIl2GQ.jpg A student and her teacher go to a secluded area in the middle of nowhere to practice open-air singing. There they run into a gang of local thugs who initially seem friendly but slowly reveal their sinister side. A Bloody Aria
